entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
